song.title: The Sun Hugger
song.info:
The winner of Nectarine time signature compo
"Written in 7/4.
3900 light-years away is PSR J1719-1438 b, an extrasolar planet that orbits so closely to its host pulsar that its orbit would fit inside the Sun. It currently has the fastest known orbit of any planet at just over 2 hours. After 10 Earth years on this planet you'd be more than 40,555 years old!"
